column4: hey, I have a folder full of images(fullsize, and thumbnails) here, and am trying to convert only the fullsize images ..  I tried using  a 'find -type f ' command, but don't know how to exclude files with the name 'thumb' in the filename..  any suggestions?
you might benefit from studying command line switches
I am studying find and grep, and piping..  but havent found an answer yet
